languages.text: "Мне сказали, что против меня выставят новичков, а не чемпионов арены!"

traits.locale_text: "Мне сказали, что против меня выставят новичков, а не чемпионов арены!"

languages.text: "I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"
languages.original_text: "Мне сказали, что против меня выставят новичков, а не чемпионов арены!"

traits.locale_text: "I was told I would be facing fresh fighters, not the champions of the arena!"
"I was told I would be facing fresh fighters, not the champions of the arena!"
"I was told I would be facing fresh fighters, not the champions of the arena!"
"I was told I would be facing fresh fighters, not the champions of the arena!"
"I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"
"I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"

languages.text: « On m'a dit que j'affronterais des combattants inexpérimentés, pas les champions de l'arène ! »
languages.original_text: "I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"

traits.locale_text: « On m'a dit que j'affronterais des nouveaux venus, pas les champions de l'arène ! »

languages.text: “他们说我的对手都是新人，根本没说过是竞技场的冠军！”
languages.original_text: "I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"

traits.locale_text: “他们说我的对手都是新人，根本没说过是竞技场的冠军！”

languages.text: 「対戦するのはアリーナの王者ではなく、新米闘士と聞いていたのに！」
languages.original_text: "I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"

traits.locale_text: 「対戦するのはアリーナの王者ではなく、新米闘士と聞いていたのに！」

languages.text: "Mir wurde gesagt, ich würde gegen unerprobte Kämpfer antreten, nicht gegen die Champions der Arena!"
languages.original_text: "I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"

traits.locale_text: "Mir wurde gesagt, ich würde gegen neue Kämpfer kämpfen und nicht gegen die Champions der Arena!"

languages.text: «¡Me dijeron que me enfrentaría a luchadores noveles, no a los campeones de la arena!».
languages.original_text: "I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Me dijeron que me enfrentaría a luchadores noveles, no a los campeones de la arena!».

languages.text: "Sınanmamış dövüşçülerle karşılaşacağım söylendi bana, arenanın müdafileriyle değil!"
languages.original_text: "I was told I would be facing untested fighters, not the champions of the arena!"

traits.locale_text: "Sınanmamış savaşçılarla karşılaşacağım söylendi bana, arenanın müdafileriyle değil!"
